casebody.data:
No. 09-167. No. 09-182. Richard Scrushy, Petitioner v. United States. Don Eugene Siegelman, Petitioner v. United States. 561 U.S. 1040, 130 S. Ct. 3541,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1120,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5528. June 29, 2010.

Petitions for writs of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and cases remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit for further consideration in light of Skilling v. United States, 561 U.S. 358, 130 S. Ct. 2896, 177 L. Ed. 2d 619 (2010).

Same cases below, 561 F.3d 1215.
